EmailTemplate.name: OTH-202309-EMP-HCT-VIRTUAL-TRANSFORMATION-EBOOK.Post-Download Follow Up (Thank y
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading our new research
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for downloading Teladoc Health’s 2023 Virtual Care Transformation Index <[[https://assets.ctfassets.net/l3v9j0ltz3yi/1ZIFEHK9gacaKuKkpudqlT/d8b91641af069c0d6d01f8cecbbdd61d/4575900_VirtualCareTransformation_E-book_v1_08282023_Final2.pdf]]>. We hope you have found the content to be informative and valuable resources as you consider your path for whole-person virtual care. In addition to our report, this summer we hosted our annual Forum event <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/forum-2023-session-summaries?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=in-text-cta&utm_term=&utm_campaign=OTH-202309-EMP-HCT-VIRTUAL-TRANSFORMATION-EBOOK&utm_campaign_id=VCT1]]> where we gathered several foremost healthcare thought leaders to discuss advancing quality healthcare through technology. Below are a few replays of discussions that may provide you with more context and insights into the themes discussed in our research report. Creating a World Where Great Healthcare is Always Within Reach <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/creating-a-world-where-great-healthcare-is-always-within-reach?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=OTH-202309-EMP-HCT-VIRTUAL-TRANSFORMATION-EBOOK&utm_campaign_id=VCT1]]> Explore global trends—including health equity, business pressures, and virtual care innovation—and the opportunity to address them in collaborative, optimistic ways. Beyond Access: Advancing Health Equity with Virtual Care <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/beyond-access-advancing-health-equity-with-virtual-care?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=OTH-202309-EMP-HCT-VIRTUAL-TRANSFORMATION-EBOOK&utm_campaign_id=VCT1]]> How can virtual care help advance health equity? A distinguished panel of experts weighs in on this critically important topic at Forum 2023. Lightening the Mental Load for Employees Living with Chronic Conditions <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/lightening-the-mental-load-for-employees-living-with-chronic-conditions?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=OTH-202309-EMP-HCT-VIRTUAL-TRANSFORMATION-EBOOK&utm_campaign_id=VCT1]]> How do we create effective benefits and communication strategies to engage employees and lighten the mental load for those living with chronic conditions. We value your feedback and would love to hear your thoughts on the eBook and the supplementary content. If you have any questions or require further clarification on any topic, please feel free to reach out <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/contact?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=OTH-202309-EMP-HCT-VIRTUAL-TRANSFORMATION-EBOOK&utm_campaign_id=VCT1]]>. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Road, Purchase NY, 10577.
